name: UBS Group AG
description: UBS Group AG is a global financial services company headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland. It operates under the principles of sustainability, innovation, and client-centricity, providing a comprehensive range of financial services tailored to meet the needs of individuals, institutions, and corporations. Founded in 1862, UBS has established a strong reputation as a leading wealth manager, investment bank, and asset manager. The firm serves clients across the globe with a focus on wealth management, where it is one of the largest players, offering personalized financial advice, investment solutions, and estate planning services. UBS is also known for its investment banking services, which include advisory on mergers and acquisitions, capital markets transactions, and risk management. The company prides itself on its commitment to sustainability, actively promoting green finance and responsible investing. In recent years, UBS has embraced digital innovation, leveraging technology to enhance client experiences and streamline operations. The firm’s mission is to provide the best financial services in a sustainable manner, helping clients achieve their financial goals while contributing positively to society.

seo.meta_title: UBS Group AG | Global Financial Services & Wealth Management
seo.meta_description: Explore UBS Group AG, a global leader in financial services, wealth management, and investment banking. Learn about our commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What services does UBS offer?
faq.answer: UBS offers a wide range of financial services including wealth management, investment banking, and asset management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UBS?
faq.answer: Ralph Hamers is the CEO of UBS Group AG.

faq.question: Where is UBS headquartered?
faq.answer: UBS is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
